page.title: 11Population in Lorton
page.content: In the 12 sq.km. block there is a population of 208, made up as follows: 59 are children and students, 40 retired people, 16 housewives, 1 unemployed, 50 local workers. This figure comprises of 2 professional people and the others are all basically outdoor manual workers plus farmers wives who either work on the farm or take in paying guests. 42 commuters i.e. those who travel out of the block to work. 17 of these people are professionals. Occupations range from architects to vetinary surgeons. There are few prospects locally for the children, those who want to pursue a profession must travel to nearby towns, first to study and then to find work. Most of the retired population live in their own homes or with their families. There is no sheltered housing available.
